messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/13/04 2:27:11 AM, Sanguinegirl83@... writes:

<< Ah, but you ARE feeding the mouse! (wink, wink!) >>

Yeah, true. I suppose it's feeding him out there or in the house, so I'll
continue to feed him in the yard. <g>

Sandra

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/16/2004 7:04:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> The question then is where to draw the line on which we feed
> and care for (Holly's pet rats) or we do not (the mouse that ran out of my
> compost pile yesterday).
>

Ah, but you ARE feeding the mouse! (wink, wink!)

Síocháin ar domhan,
Sang
